_sText: Yes, another greatriver version. The map has been online for quite a while now, this upload is on request. This clanmap has a lot of boost and is easy to surf. R.I.P. X-dream Clan These servers are running xdre4m Changes made from xdr3am -> xdre4m - Installed a 5 min. timer which activates nade battle - A lot of optimization, bugfixes - Reduced filesize - Texture change - Anti-camp on sky - Added 2 small secrets - Added 1 bigger secret -> lasers in jail - Added a 'Hint-room' wich gives hints about the 3 secrets - Removed 'bridge' - Removed glass at top - Replaced lettering with new - Added water on top - Direct access to boost beneath pool - Added a few secret teleports - Removed secret room beneath ct spawn NOTE: THE PINK WATER IS JUST MY GRAPHICS CARD SUCKING Our latest clanmovie includes this map: X-dreams 3d clanmovie Please comment & assess
